title: Davos 2024 LIVE: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Speaks at 'Technology in a Turbulent World' | WEF 2024 | N18L
description:
LIVE: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Speaks at 'Technology in a Turbulent World' | WEF 2024 | Davos | CNBC TV18

OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says concerns that artificial intelligence will one day become so powerful that it will dramatically reshape and disrupt the world are overblown.

#samaltman #openai  #davos #davos24 #worldeconomicforum #worldeconomicforum2024 #wef2024 #wef24 #technology #artificialintelligence #chatgpt #generativeai #cnbctv18
